name: Spiral Clicker
description:
Spiral Clicker is a clicker style game in which a mysterious elf with absolutely no ulterior motives whatsoever has given you access to a magical spiral that can drain your willpower and turn it into energy you can use to build your dream harem out of the girls at your local college.

Earn willpower by clicking, then spend that willpower to unlock new characters to interact with. Level them up by breaking the mental barriers in their mind in order to unlock new conversations, CGs, costumes, and bonuses to help you collect willpower, or break barriers more easily.

Features:

  • Unlockable characters
  • Unlockable costumes for each character
  • Unlockable CGs and dialogues with characters in the game
